column5: 10 min to Medical Center/NRG stadium, shopping close by, 20 minutes to downtown. Walking distance to two bus lines and easy access to light rail. Large bedroom with WiFi, cable TV, 2 twin beds, closet. Relaxing, peaceful home, great for studying/working, kitchen access. Residential street parking or driveway. Complimentary coffee every morning and snacks. My house is your house! My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
